articles.author: Paul Best
articles.title: House to consider TikTok legislation after CEO's testimony, Speaker McCarthy says - Fox Business
articles.description: Speaker of the House Kevin McCarthy, R-Calif., said that Congress will move forward with legislation on TikTok to "protect Americans from the technological tentacles of the Chinese Communist Party."
articles.content: The House of Representatives will move forward with legislation on TikTok, House Speaker Kevin McCarthy said Sunday, just days after CEO Shou Zi Chew was grilled by lawmakers on Capitol Hill about th… [+2452 chars]
